about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling adventure in the mesmerizing voxel art world of "Breached," where the excitement of a roguelite twin-stick shooter seamlessly blends the adrenaline-pumping intensity of rapid-fire combat with the intricate strategy of rogue-inspired gameplay. Immerse yourself in an endlessly replayable journey, with each playthrough revealing new enigmas, delivering relentless battles deep within a mysterious hidden bunker, and uncovering a sinister conspiracy linked to a covert bioweapon project. Get ready to shape your one-of-a-kind character and face high-stakes confrontations while navigating a relentless wave of zombies and bio-modified soldiers, ensuring an experience that keeps you coming back for more.

Key Features


  • Roguelite Thrills: Embrace the roguelike challenge with a persistent progression system that keeps you coming back for more. Each run is a new chance to improve your character, unlocking new skills, weapons, and abilities as you push deeper into the game.

  • Twin-Stick Mayhem: Hone your skills in a dynamic twin-stick control scheme, offering full control over your character's movement and precise aiming. Unleash a torrent of bullets and make split-second decisions in the heat of battle.

  • Replayable Levels: Venture into worlds filled with diverse environments, enemies, and power-ups. each time starts at a different location in the map with great replayability

  • Upgrade and Customization: Gather resources and unlock a vast array of weapons, abilities, and character enhancements. Tailor your loadout and abilities to match your preferred playstyle and adapt to the ever-evolving threats.

  • Fast-Paced Action: Engage in relentless battles against waves of hordes, with quick reflexes and strategic decision-making being your keys to survival. Dodge bullets, exploit enemy weaknesses, and unlock the path to victory.

  • Strategic Choices: Navigate your way through a web of choices, from selecting routes through the game world to deciding which upgrades to prioritize. Your strategic decisions will determine your success.

  • Unlockable Content: Unearth hidden secrets and unlock new characters, weapons, and game modes as you delve deeper into the mysterious bunker filled with bio-modified soldiers

  • Immersive Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the game's dynamic soundtrack, designed to intensify the action and keep your heart pounding.

  • Quick Replays: Get right back into the action with seamless restarts, ensuring you'll want to dive into just one more thrilling run.

Step into an unrelenting world where every attempt brings new possibilities, rewards, and challenges. Will you harness your skills and strategy to survive the breached bunker filled with zombies and bio-modified soldiers?

name: Breached

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHZ Single Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Supported Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 4.0+ GHZ Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 6800+ or ATI Radeon X700+ Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Supported Sound Card

short_description: Prepare for an enthralling journey as you step into the mesmerizing voxel art world of "Breached." This roguelite twin-stick shooter seamlessly marries the thrill of rapid-fire combat with the nuanced strategy of rogue-inspired gameplay, creating a gaming experience like no other.
